author: Special Correspondent
text:
You can now use a credit or a debit card to avail yourself of the services of e-Service Centres of the Tamil Nadu Arasu TV Corporation (TACTV).

Equipment installed

An official release said that the necessary equipment have been installed at the e-Service centres and no special fee would be collected for the use of debit cards from applicants.

“Debit cards of all banks can be used. While using credit cards, a service cess of 1.5 per cent and service tax would be collected,” it added.
title: Now, swipe your cards in e-Service Centres
